title: Bug 124620 - Referenced Parameter icon remains valid after deleting parameter in library
OB: After deleting a parameter in the library, if we reopen the report design file, the icon of the referenced parameter remains unchanged. However, if the same operations are performed on a dataset, the icon of the dataset in the report becomes invalid.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open a report design file that contains a parameter from the library. 2. Delete the parameter in the library. 3. Reopen the report design file. 4. Observe that the icon for the referenced parameter is still valid.
